text: ane temani komana loko dodata dodata temani pase pahoncya, te to pahelathi ja duskarmo karata hata, luta (a.Sa.) E kahyum, he komana loko! A che mari dikari'o je tamara mate khuba ja pavitra che, allahathi daro ane mane mara mahemano same apamanita na karo, sum tamaramam eka pana saro vyakti nathi
